metadata.title: PM felicitates Lee Jae-Myung on his victory in Korean presidential elections

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 4 (APP):Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday congratulated Lee Jae-Myung on his victory in the Presidential elections in South Korea. In his social media post on X, the prime minister wished the president-elect Lee a successful tenure in office, expressing the hope to work together with him to foster stronger Pakistan-Korea relations.
